lastfmr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get information about a user profile.

Source: R/user.R
user_getInfo.Rd

Get information about a user profile. Implementation of last.fm's user.getInfo API method (http://www.last.fm/api/show/user.getInfo).

user_getInfo(user)

Arguments

user

The user to fetch info for.

Value

A list of user profile information

Examples

user_getInfo("platyjus")
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#>   playlists playcount gender     name subscriber
#> 1         0      9373      n platyjus          0
#>                                 url country
#> 1 https://www.last.fm/user/platyjus    None
#>                                                                     image.extralarge
#> 1 https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/300x300/09b1ff0164e9c676385920bbd1e0af81.png
#>                                                                       image.large
#> 1 https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/174s/09b1ff0164e9c676385920bbd1e0af81.png
#>                                                                     image.medium
#> 1 https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/64s/09b1ff0164e9c676385920bbd1e0af81.png
#>                                                                      image.small
#> 1 https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/34s/09b1ff0164e9c676385920bbd1e0af81.png
#>   registered.unixtime registered..text type age bootstrap realname
#> 1          1459304044       1459304044 user   0         0
